question: Which of the following won the gold medal in badminton men's doubles in the 2016 Summer Olympics?
option2: Goh V Shem and Tan Wee Kiong
explanation: Zhang Nan and Fu Haifeng won the gold medal in badminton men's doubles in the 2016 Summer Olympics. The badminton tournaments at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil took place from 11 to 20 August.
